name: preferable
content:

Add to word list
B2 better or more suitable: Surely a diplomatic solution is preferable to war.
More examplesFewer examplesAnything would be preferable to war.Earlier would be preferable from my point of view.Wednesday would be preferable.Is either venue preferable for you?Staying at home is certainly preferable to going out with someone you don't like.

better or more desirable: We could take a later flight if it would be preferable. Surely a diplomatic solution is preferable to war. preferably adverb [ not gradable ] us

/ˈpref·ər·ə·bli/
We’re looking for a new house, preferably one closer to the school.
